    Suppliers

    Trusted leaders focused on connecting cost with quality, where efficiency and empathy come together.

    Why Vizient?

    Vizient provides health care solutions that make a difference

    Vizient™ combines the strengths of VHA, University HealthSystem Consortium, Novation and MedAssets SCM and Sg2, trusted leaders focused on solving health care's most pressing challenges. We allow you to focus on what you do best: delivering exceptional, cost-effective care.

    View all press releases

    Better care leads to a better quality of life for everyone. With the collaborative power of Vizient’s expertise, solutions and unique insights, together we can achieve something greater.

    Curt NonomaquePresident and CEO, Vizient

    Story title goes here

    At Vizient, we strive to help members solve the challenges we know affect the quality of clinical care and operational efficiency, making sure it is never compromised. Our consulting arm provides members with valuable data and insights and advisory services that are unmatched in the industry.

    Supplier benefits

    1

    Increased efficiency

    In today’s health care environment, the rules are shifting and resources are limited. Health care organizations require a strategic, executable roadmap to meet performance, financial and quality objectives to make sure care is truly patient centered. Lorem ipsum dolor et ami consectetur adipiscing. Lorem ipsum dolor et ami consectetur adipiscing.

    2

    Increased visibility

    As health care shifts from fee-for-service to the fee-for-value model, hospitals must optimize their operations to more closely align costs with clinical outcomes. We offer expert advice and proven solutions, all designed to help members improve clinical quality, operational performance and financial results.

    3

    Increased credibility

    The health care industry is going though rapid and fundamental change. SG2 is a consulting arm that helps our clients navigate and anticipate major shifts in care delivery, innovation and public policy. They enable senior leaders strive to achieve sustainable growth and maintain market relevance with new strategies to drive clinically appropriate, profitable growth

    View all benefits
